name: Advanced Aquarium
description: The Advanced Aquarium allows Prospectors to store and display their favorite catches. Fish stored in the Advanced Aquarium will not spoil so long as it is connected to a power network providing at least 1,000 units of Power and a water network providing at least 500 units of Water . The Advanced Aquarium will not function if these requirements are not met. The Advanced Aquarium can store 4 fish.
